name: Communications
description: In the first term, students will advance their knowledge of work-related opportunities in Materials Science Engineering and communicate this knowledge in oral and written forms to their instructors and peers. Students will work in teams of three or four on most assignments. In the second term, students will individually research a self-selected state-of-the-art topic in Materials Science Engineering. Students will write a short report on their research topics and then conclude the term by presenting their research in poster form to their peers and instructors.
